snippet: The documents relate to an investigation and indictment of the man suspected of leading the kidnappers, and provide no evidence that the top leaders of Hamas directed or had prior knowledge of the plot to abduct the three Israeli youths.
lead_paragraph: The documents relate to an investigation and indictment of the man suspected of leading the kidnappers, and provide no evidence that the top leaders of Hamas directed or had prior knowledge of the plot to abduct the three Israeli youths.

headline.main: Israel Documents on Hamas Role in Killings of Teenagers
